TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEquatable`1<T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IEquatable

span.span: The type of objects to compare.

summary.span: 定义由值类型或类实现的通用方法，旨在创建特定于类型的方法以确定实例的质量。

span.span: Defines a generalized method that a value type or class implements to create a type-specific method for determining equality of instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由其值可以为等同 (例如, 数值和字符串类) 的类型实现。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be equated (for example, the numeric and string classes). 值类型或类实现方法, 以创建适合用于确定实例相等性的类型特定方法。A value type or class implements the method to create a type-specific method suitable for determining equality of instances. > [!NOTE] > 接口定义方法, 该方法确定实现类型的实例的排序顺序。The interface defines the method, which determines the sort order of instances of the implementing type. 接口定义方法, 该方法确定实现类型的实例的相等性。The interface defines the method, which determines the equality of instances of the implementing type. 当在 、`IndexOf`、和`Remove`等方法中测试相等性时, 泛型集合对象 (如、和) 使用接口。 `LastIndexOf` `Contains`The interface is used by generic collection objects such as , , and when testing for equality in such methods as `Contains`, `IndexOf`, `LastIndexOf`, and `Remove`. 应为可能存储在泛型集合中的任何对象实现它。It should be implemented for any object that might be stored in a generic collection. ## Examples 请参阅方法的示例。See the example for the method.

para.span: 将接口的类型参数替换为实现此接口的类型。

span.span: Replace the type parameter of the interface with the type that is implementing this interface.

para.span: 如果实现, 则还应重写和的基类实现, 以使它们的行为与方法的行为一致。

span.span: If you implement , you should also override the base class implementations of and so that their behavior is consistent with that of the method.

para.span: 如果确实要重写, 则也会在对类的静态方法的调用中调用重写的实现。

span.span: If you do override , your overridden implementation is also called in calls to the static method on your class.

para.span: 此外, 还应重载和运算符。

span.span: In addition, you should overload the and operators.

para.span: 这可以确保相等性的所有测试都返回一致的结果。

span.span: This ensures that all tests for equality return consistent results.

para.span: 有关替代的信息, 请参阅文章。

span.span: For information on overriding , see the article.

para.span: 对于值类型, 应始终实现并重写以获得更好的性能。

span.span: For a value type, you should always implement and override for better performance.

para.span: 框值类型并依赖于反射来比较两个值是否相等。

span.span: boxes value types and relies on reflection to compare two values for equality.

para.span: 的实现和的重写都应返回一致的结果。

span.span: Both your implementation of and your override of should return consistent results.

para.span: 如果实现, 则还应实现 , 前提是可以对类型的实例进行排序或排序。

span.span: If you implement , you should also implement if instances of your type can be ordered or sorted.

para.span: 如果你的类型实现, 你几乎始终都实现。

span.span: If your type implements , you almost always also implement .

para.span: 请注意, 在某些设计中, 类型支持订单关系, 但相等性可能不同于排序关系。

span.span: Note that there are some designs where a type supports an order relation, but equality may be distinct from an ordering relation.

para.span: 请考虑`Person`一个按字母顺序排序的类。

span.span: Consider a `Person` class where you sort alphabetically.

para.span: 具有相同名称的两个人对相同, 但不是同一个人。

span.span: Two people with the same name sort the same, but are not the same person.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Equals(!T other) cil managed
Public Function Equals (other As T) As Boolean

param.name: other
param.span: 一个与此对象进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with this object.

summary.span: 指示当前对象是否等于同一类型的另一个对象。

span.span: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.

returns.span: 如果当前对象等于 参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current object is equal to the parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的实现旨在执行与类型`T`的另一个对象相等的测试, 与当前对象的类型相同。The implementation of the method is intended to perform a test for equality with another object of type `T`, the same type as the current object. 此方法在以下情况下调用:The method is called in the following circumstances: - 调用方法时`other` , 参数是类型`T`的强类型对象。 `Equals`When the `Equals` method is called and the `other` argument is a strongly-typed object of type `T`. (如果`other`不是类型`T`, 则调用基方法。(If `other` is not of type `T`, the base method is called. 对于这两种方法 , 提供了更好的性能。)Of the two methods, offers slightly better performance.) - 当调用多个泛型集合对象的搜索方法时。When the search methods of a number of generic collection objects are called. 其中一些类型及其方法包括:Some of these types and their methods include the following: - 方法的一些泛型重载。Some of the generic overloads of the method. - 类的搜索方法, 包括、 、和。The search methods of the class, including , , , and . - 类的搜索方法, 包括和。The search methods of the class, including and . - 泛型类的搜索方法, 包括和。The search methods of the generic class, including and . 换句话说, 若要处理某个类的对象将存储在数组或泛型集合对象中的可能性, 最好实现此方法, 以便能够轻松地标识和操作该对象。In other words, to handle the possibility that objects of a class will be stored in an array or a generic collection object, it is a good idea to implement so that the object can be easily identified and manipulated. 实现方法时, 请为泛型类型参数指定的类型适当地定义相等性。When implementing the method, define equality appropriately for the type specified by the generic type argument. 例如, 如果类型参数为, 则为 2 32 位有符号整数的比较适当地定义相等性。For example, if the type argument is , define equality appropriately for the comparison of two 32-bit signed integers. ## Examples 下面`Person`的示例演示实现并具有两个属性 (和`SSN`) `LastName`的类的分部实现。The following example shows the partial implementation of a `Person` class that implements and has two properties, `LastName` and `SSN`. 如果两个`True`对象的 `SSN`属性相同,`False`则该方法返回; 否则返回。 `Person`The method returns `True` if the `SSN` property of two `Person` objects is identical; otherwise, it returns `False`. [!code-csharp[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/cs/EqualsEx2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/vb/EqualsEx2.vb#3)] `Person`然后, 可以将对象存储在对象中, 并可`Contains`通过方法进行标识, 如下面的示例所示。`Person` objects can then be stored in a object and can be identified by the `Contains` method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/cs/Snippet12.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/vb/Snippet12.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果实现, 则还应重写和的基类实现, 以使它们的行为与方法的行为一致。

span.span: If you implement , you should also override the base class implementations of and so that their behavior is consistent with that of the method.

para.span: 如果确实要重写, 则也会在对类的静态方法的调用中调用重写的实现。

span.span: If you do override , your overridden implementation is also called in calls to the static method on your class.

para.span: 此外, 还应重载和运算符。

span.span: In addition, you should overload the and operators.

para.span: 这可确保所有相等测试都返回一致的结果, 如示例所示。

span.span: This ensures that all tests for equality return consistent results, which the example illustrates.
